channel.title: Hike on Shelter's House
channel.description: Recent content in Hike on Shelter's House

item.title: Gym, Happy Hour & Life
item.description: I am still feeling so incredibly spoiled for having Zac home. I know that he’ll be starting another project soon and be back to traveling, but I am loving having him home! Monday I finally did something I have been thinking about for a while. I deactivated Facebook. Seriously, I have wanted to get it out of my life for awhile. I was spending too much time doing nothing on there- and actually just hated it.

item.title: Life this week..
